Package com.github.games647.scoreboardstats

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Updater.UpdateCallback
    Called on main thread when the Updater has finished working, regardless of result.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BukkitScoreboardManager
    Managing the scoreboard access.
    DelayedShowTask
    Scheduled appear task
    FastOfflinePlayer
    Since 1.7 Bukkit introduced CraftServer.getOfflinePlayer(String name).
    Lang
    Separate the code and the messages.
    PlayerListener
    Listening to players events.
    RefreshTask
    Handling all updates for a player in a performance optimized variant.
    ReloadFixLoader
    This class resolves the issue that the plugin couldn't find a specific resource after changing the plugin file.
    SbManager
    Manage the scoreboard access.
    ScoreboardStats
    Represents the main class of this plugin.
    TicksPerSecondTask
    Tracks how many ticks are passed per second.
    Updater
    This is a simpler and optimized version of Gravity's Updater Thanks for the great work You can find his project here: https://github.com/gravitylow/Updater/
    UpdaterFix
    This file exists to make sure auto updater doesn't check for new updates if the user has a development version.
    Version
    Version class for comparing and detecting Minecraft and other versions
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Updater.UpdateResult
    Gives the developer the result of the update process.
